title: Rule 11

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Transform a player's visit into a Basic Attack.
-Grant a player Basic defense

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-While you are alive, all Attack and Defense Values from all roles are deleted.
-You may multitask
-You may not self target.
-You have to use your first ability each night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Do not cause anyone to die as a direct result of your abilities until the end of the game.
